title: Sci-Fi Sounds and Loops Vol.2
description: "Sci-Fi Textures and Loops" are unique sound effects in WAV 24 Bit 96 kHz format that are suitable for creating a dark, mysterious, alien atmosphere.
longDescription:
Audio Demo

"Sci-Fi Textures and Loops" are unique sound effects in WAV 24 Bit 96 kHz format that are suitable for creating a dark, mysterious, alien atmosphere when creating science fiction films, games, and music tracks.


"Sci-Fi Textures and Loops Vol. 2" includes sound effects such as:


• Sci-Fi Alien Machine

• Sci-Fi Alien Machine in Motion

• Sci-Fi Alien Machine Sweeps Past

• Sci-Fi Chaotic Bells

• Sci-Fi Detector

• Sci-Fi Flying Drone

• Sci-Fi Glide Bells

• Sci-Fi Helicopter

• Sci-Fi Hum

• Sci-Fi Rotating Mechanism

• Sci-Fi Short Horror Effect

• Sci-Fi Transformator


Each sound effect of this sample pack has 10 variations of different pitches, loop and non-loop versions.


Product Details:

• 260 WAV files

• 96kHz/24Bit

• 1.50 GB
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 260

Number of Audio Cues: 260

Sample rate / bit rate: 96000 Hz

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: Sci-Fi Textures and Loops Vol.2 - Sound-List
